巏字的基本解释

巏
quán
〔巏嵍〕山名，在中国河北省隆尧县西。

巏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［quán］
山名用字。参见“巏嵍”。

巏字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　巏； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页322第35
《集韻》《類篇》?逵員切，音權。巏務，山名。【集韻】在柏人城東北。【顏氏家訓】柏人城東北有山，或呼爲宣務山，莫知所出，讀城西門内?銘云：土有巏務山，王喬所仙，乃知俗呼宣務卽巏務山。　又【玉篇】古亂切【集韻】【類篇】古玩切，?音貫。山名。

考證：〔【集韻】連元切，【類篇】逵員切，?音權。〕　謹照集韻類篇原文，改爲集韻類篇?逵員切，音權。〔【顏氏家訓】柏人城東北有山，或呼虛無山，莫知所出，讀城西?銘云，上有巏務山，王喬所仙。〕　謹照原文虛無改作爲宣務三字。城西下增門内二字。上字改作土字。
巏字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
巏字的起名意思

暂无。

巏
quán
〔巏嵍〕The name of the mountain is in the west of Longyao County, Hebei Province, China.

The name of the mountain is written in words. See "巏嵍".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji] [Mountain Character Department] 　巏; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 322 35
"Jiyun" "Class Pian"? Kui Yuanqie, sound right. General affairs, name of the mountain. 【Jiyun】In the northeast of Bairen City. [Family Instructions of Yan Family] There is a mountain in the northeast of Bairen City, or it is called Xuanwu Mountain. Do not know what it is. Reading in the west gate of the city? Shangwu Mountain.　[Jade articles] Ancient chaotic cutting [Jiyun] [Classic articles] Antique cutting, sound continuity. Mountain name. Textual research: [[Jiyun] Lian Yuanqie, [Class Chapter] Kuiyuanqie, and sound power. 〕 　 I would like to take the original text of Ji Yun, and change it to Ji Yun. Kui Yuanqie, Yin Quan. 〔【Family Instructions of Yan Family】There are mountains in the northeast of Bairen City, or Wuwu Mountain, do not know what to come out, read the city west? Mingyun, there is Shangwu Mountain, Wang Qiao is immortal. 〕　I would like to modify the original nihilism as the three characters for public affairs. The word "Zengmennei" is under the west of the city. The upper character was changed to an earth character.
